page.title: 06The 1st Hook Cubs Pack
page.content: I am a Cub.I go to{Cubs}on a{Thusday. It start at {6.30pm}and ends at{8.00pm We meet at{Hook School.}Our leaders are called{Akala,Balloo}and{Kaa.}You can start at cubs when you are eight and finish when you are ten.We do work and play games.We have made a bird- table which we are going to put up in the school garden.We are also going to make a bird-box.We do work for badges and I have already got two.At Cubs we are grouped in sixes.There is{Red Six, {Blue Six}and{Yellow Six.}I am in{Red {Six.}We go on visits to different places and we also go camping.I have been to camp once.I have found lots of friends at Cubs and I enjoy going.
